articles.title: Tiger Woods's ex accuses him of sexual harassment while she was his employee - The Guardian
articles.description: Erica Herman files court documents alleging she was forced to sign an NDA about their relationship or lose her job
articles.content:
Tiger Woodss ex-girlfriend has accused him of sexually harassing her while his employee, alleging that the star golfer forced her to sign a non-disclosure agreement or be fired from her job.

articles.title: Controversies over crosswinds and nature break rob Demi Vollering of Vuelta Femenina red jersey - Cyclingnews
articles.description: 'I am hungry for revenge' says tearful Team SD Worx rider with one day remaining to race
articles.content: Saturday's stage of La Vuelta Femenina raised controversy as overall leader Demi Vollering (Team SD Worx) lost her red classification jersey to Annemiek van Vleuten (Movistar Team). It began only 36k… [+4759 chars]
